alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Haywood; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Tipton, northwestern Fayette and southwestern Haywood Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Covington, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Covington, Brighton, Atoka, Mason, Gallaway, Stanton, Braden, Belmont, Cotton Lake, Canaan Grove, Keeling, Gift, Shepp, Gainesville, Tabernacle, Clopton, Turnpike, Idaville, Akins Corner and Meux Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
